t: I ended up buying from a bunch of different knockoff brands like Bebe Amour, Trend Mall, Amazon shops, etc. I was filming a YouTube video and both of these moments happened which I thought was really telling of the quality that these brands have. Every single one had identical stitching and fabric- showing that all of these brands are using the same dropship product manufactured in the same place.  When buying from these brands, you do not know what the actual fabric you were getting is, whether it's safe for your baby to have their mouth on, etc. You're also getting a product that is not safety tested for infants in any way. 50% of the products that I bought from these brands were either broken on arrival or quickly sheered in my hands with minimum stress. Can you imagine if you put your baby or toddler in here?  Just to reshare this, I do NOT recommend Bebe Amour or any other brand that has used my videos in their marketing for a knock off Hippie Joey. They have stolen that content from myself and content from other creators including even Hippie Joey themselves. If you go through the reviews, many of them are stolen as well! You can find the exact reviews on all of these websites with different names attached. It's incredibly disgusting that a brand would put infant lives at risk to make money.  Again, if you have one and it seems to work for you, please please go to the Hippie Joey website to get accurate safety information on how to use it. It's not going to be as supportive or safe as a Hippie Joey, But following their safety recommendations is vital if you want to continue using your product safely.  If you are willing to share this, that would be incredible! Also comments, liking, etc are incredibly helpful to get videos like this out and seen. I do not have the advertising power that brands like Bebe Amour have. They can use my videos falsely and put significant ad spend behind it due to making a huge profit off the cheap product they are selling (at a huge markup.) Their product is IDENTICAL to a $15 one off Amazon I found.  The @hippiejoeyco is genuinely different- I've shown that before and have it as a pinned video. #bebeamour #infantsafety  | TikTok
